data.DescriptionHtml: This spell functions like summon desert ally I, except that you can summon one 9th-level creature, 1d3 8th-level creatures of the same kind, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures of the
data.Effect: One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
data.Name: Summon Desert Ally Ix
